name: Trials of Survivial
description:
You are a noble warrior who must face a dreadful test to earn the title of samurai. 

This test is called the "Trials of Survival" in  which only a few survive. Using your trusted katana, you must battle you way though waves of enemies while also increasing your power throughout.

Your sword has 2 stances each unique and good for different situations. More information in the "Tutorial Page."

Each  stance is a 3-hit combo that ramps up as you progress through it.

Good luck on your trials warrior!

Credit: 

  • Character animations and model - Frank Climax  
  • Chest Model and animations - Unity asset store
  • Various textures/icons - Unity asset store
